solution_line_template: The time it took Manu to complete the race is {patrick_finish_time} + {manu_extra_time} = <<{patrick_finish_time}+{manu_extra_time}={manu_total_time}>>{manu_total_time} seconds
If Amy is twice as fast as Manu, then she takes half the time Manu did to finish the race, so Amy took {amy_time_numerator}/{amy_time_divisor} * {manu_total_time} = {amy_time} seconds.
